index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's Community Development Block Grant Program for the Grant Program Year January 1, 1992 through December 31, 1992, accepting financial assistance from the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development; appropriating these funds and program income received into the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund; authorizing implementation of certain projects by the Department of Administrative Services, Department of Housing and Human Services, Department of Neighborhoods, and the Executive Department, and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
